message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I think you'll find it's a great opportunity. I'm willing to offer it to you for $11000.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to stay within my budget. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $9500.

Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob. I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, but I need to make sure I get a fair price for the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a bit more than $9500. I'm counteroffering at $10500.
Thank you for considering my previous counteroffer, Alice. I appreciate your response. I would like to make another attempt to reach an agreement within my budget. My counteroffer is now at $10000.
